com.soa.agent
Class SourceMessage

java.lang.Object
  com.soa.agent.AbstractMessage
      com.soa.agent.SourceMessage
All Implemented Interfaces:
Message
public class SourceMessage
extends AbstractMessage

Holds a message to be delivered through application and classloader boundaries. As such, it must only container data members that are of types found in the Java JRE.
